**MOTION DESIGNER:** Serena Paratore
description:
Galatine was looking for a video to promote their 60th anniversary on social networks and asked one of Mosaicoon that I usually work for to take part of the pitch.\
I decided to engage a dear friend illustrator (Valentina Cherubini) who has supported me during all the work.

Unfortunately for us, Galatine did not count with our proposal, but we are extremely happy the end result, despite the proposal sent by the client.

Galatine wanted to celebrate the 60th anniversary of its brand, and the genuineness of the product that has accompanied its consumers for many years.

The special client request was to create a 30'' video that was divided into 2 shorter but interconnected.
